alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 2:08AM PST until November 24 at 2:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to four inches in northern Elko county with three to six inches across the Ruby Mountains and up to a foot in the Jarbidge Wilderness area. Locally higher amounts are possible. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 2 AM Thursday to 2 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County
